summary: Adds Snails, Slugs and Snaians-Sluans in Skyrim. You can mount different Snails or Slugs. You can incarnate Snaians/Sluan or create armies of Snaians. You can visit a Mushroom House with 2 Companions Snaian-Sluan and a mysterious cave...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][b]Versions 5.1.4[/b][/color] (Snails, Slugs, Snaians, Sluans) and [color=#00ff00][b]Version 6.1.3[/b][/color] (Snails, Slugs, Snaians, Sluans - Turbo the Snail and Roz the Slug are [i]REPLACED by 3 Horses: Long/Ebony/Leather Armored[/i])

Adds Snails, Slugs and Snaians-Sluans in Skyrim. You can mount different Snails or Slugs. You can incarnate Snaians/Sluan or create armies of Snaians. You can visit a Mushroom House with 2 Companions Snaian-Sluan and a mysterious cave.........No DLC needed (also No Scripts, No SKSE...Nothing/Rien/Nada...Except the pleasure of playing to this mod!)

[color=#00ff00]Optional Files: Esp version Fr. pour 5.1.4 et pour 6.1.3[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/cLAEUY0.gif[/img]

After 4 years of wandering through the world of Skyrim, facing thousands of dangers and hitching a ride on all sorts of unlikely creatures in order to get from one place to another, I have finally decided to settle down!

Fate put me in the path of an interesting couple who, despite being quite repulsive at first, turned out to be very welcoming. They introduced themselves as naturalists; I honestly never believed them (it was as if I had introduced myself as a science teacher… how preposterous!) but they were so nice, quite slobbery for sure (but we all have our flaws!). Anyway, they showed me around their house, quite peculiar at first. From the outside, it’s a mushroom, but wait until you see the inside! I was astonished by the display of bugs, insects, fish, not to mention the mushrooms and different plants.

He seems quite busy on the ground floor. When he’s not eating (which he seems to be doing quite often, he must have a big appetite), it seems to me that he busies himself making concoctions with plants or insects… He must have brought some back from his exotic travels, as I had never seen such fish in the kingdom of Skyrim.

She never leaves her underground lair and busies herself around the kitchen, when she is not tanning skins… The beds are so Spartan! If I have to sleep here, I’d better get used to it! Could someone just direct me towards the toilet? And what about running water? Well, you probably have to go outside for such facilities! It’s not that bad as long as it’s only for a little while, until I find a better place…

As I am very curious, I wanted to see the whole place. I had the fright of my life when I went down to what they call their cellar (after all, they cultivate mushrooms there, in the dark) so… I nearly died in that cellar, it’s a good thing they were with me!

But I talk too much, it would be much better if you would call over, their house is open day and night… I probably won’t be around, but you will probably be as surprised as I was the first time I went over…


(Un grand Merci pour la traduction du texte ci-dessous à [b][color=#ff0000]LN[/color][/b] qui a finalisé le travail, ainsi qu'à [color=#ff0000]Just Call Me Frosty/laiilaiiheii [/color]qui le premier s'est gentiment proposé pour ce dur labeur!)


[i] Après 4 années d’errance à travers Bordeciel, à affronter mille dangers et à monter sur des créatures toutes plus improbables les unes que les autres pour me déplacer, j’ai enfin décidé de me fixer !

Le hasard a voulu que je rencontre un couple très curieux, repoussant au premier abord, mais au final très accueillant : ils se sont présentés comme des naturalistes ! Franchement je ne les ai pas cru une seconde (c’est comme si je m’étais présenté comme Professeur de Sciences … du grand n’importe quoi !), mais ils sont tellement gentils, un peu baveux certes (mais nous avons bien tous nos petits défauts …) ; Bref ils m’ont fait visiter leur maison, très spéciale au premier abord : à l’extérieur c’est un champignon ! Mais l’intérieur !! Là j’ai été ébloui par la collection de bestioles, insectes, poissons, ainsi que de champignons ou de plantes diverses …

Lui, a l’air de bien s’occuper au rez-de-chaussée, quand il ne mange pas (ce qu’il fait très souvent, il doit avoir un solide appétit), j’ai l’impression qu’il fait des préparations à base de plantes ou d’insectes … Il a dû ramener certains de ces animaux de voyages lointains, car je n’avais encore jamais vu de tels poissons à travers tout Bordeciel !

Elle, ne sort pas de son antre en sous-sol, occupée dans sa cuisine, ou bien encore à préparer des peaux … Les lits sont vraiment spartiates ! Si je dois dormir là, il faudra que je m’y habitue ! (mais qu’on me dise où sont les toilettes ? et l’eau courante ?… Bon, il faut sans doute aller à l’extérieur pour ces petites commodités, bref ce n’est pas grave si cela ne dure que quelque temps en attendant de trouver mieux …)

Comme je suis très curieux, j’ai voulu tout visiter, et vraiment j’ai eu la peur de ma vie en descendant dans ce qu’ils appellent leur cave (certes, ils y cultivent des champignons -dans le noir-) ; bref dans cette « grotte » j’ai cru mourir, heureusement qu’ils étaient là !

… Mais je parle trop, ce serait beaucoup mieux si vous pouviez passer : la maison est ouverte jour et nuit … je ne serai probablement pas là, mais vous serez sans aucun doute aussi surpris que j’ai pu l’être la première fois …[/i]


[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=998323SnailsslugsandSnaianssteam.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/998323SnailsslugsandSnaianssteam.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=313839Snailswithhorses.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/313839Snailswithhorses.jpg[/img][/url]

Video by [color=#ff0000]RLSD[/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]KoRjRXHoyb8[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


Video by [color=#ff0000]S.Silin (Ikari)/Chaos_Hellfire[/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]hVN2AcZDMhk[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]WILD[/color][/size][/b]

Wild Snails (76) and Slugs (33) can be found around Whiterun (on roads and in cultivated fields !)...

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]MOUNTS[/color][/size][/b]

1) You have "[b]Turbo[/b]" (a Snail) and "[b]Roz[/b]" (a Slug) near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)

2) You have also the Summonable Mounts...

To have the Summonable Snails/Slugs, you must buy the 7 “Spell tome: XXX” at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor"

With the books you have the spells....Then summon the Snails/Slugs...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=639545Farengar.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/639545Farengar.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color]

1) You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 7 books (Normally this is done automatically)

You can find the “Spell tome XXXX",at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whitherun) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

If you have not bought the book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the book, etc

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ZhCJIjN.gif[/img]

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]ARMIES OF SNAIANS[/color][/size][/b]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of SNAIANS (5, 15, 50, MORE ? ...[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer ![/color])

The SNAIANS are terrible Dwarfs Gastropods !

To obtain these eggs, simply bring the “SNAIAN/RED/GREEN/BLUE Egg” found with some merchants in [color=#00ff00]WHITERUN[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i][/b]) to a forge and create the "Incubated SNAIAN/RED/GREEN/BLUE Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Snaians

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.



[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]INCARNATE SNAIANS/SLUAN[/color][/size][/b]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create a new “SNAIAN or SLUAN” armor with the fire of the forge

To obtain these [color=#00ff00][b]5 [/b][/color]Snaians/Sluan Armors, go to a forge and create the "Snaian/Red/Green/Blue (or Sluan) Armor" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Outfit" (“Tenue” in French) and they are there. You only have to try…



[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]MUSHROOM HOUSE[/color][/size][/b]

Near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun), you can visit this special house, with his paddock for gastropods, two Snaian/Sluan Companions and a mysterious cave…

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=596972DecoMushroomHouse.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/596972DecoMushroomHouse.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=120689Mysteriouscave3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/120689Mysteriouscave3.jpg[/img][/url]

[b]And also 2 Fish tanks/Aquariums with some Fishes[/b]:

[b]Freshwater fishes[/b]:

1) [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pterophyllum#P._scalare] Freshwater angelfish [/url] (Pterophyllum scalare) [color=#00ff00]All versions[/color]

2) [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neon_tetra] Neon tetra [/url] (Paracheirodon innesi) [color=#00ff00]All versions[/color]

3) [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discus_(fish)] Discus [/url] (Symphysodon) [color=#00ff00]Only 5.1.4 and 6.1.3[/color]

4) [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siamese_tigerfish]Siamese tigerfish [/url] (Datnioides pulcher)[color=#00ff00] Only 5.1.4 C[/color]

[b]Marine fish/Saltwater fish[/b]:

5) [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amphiprioninae] Clownfish [/url] (Amphiprioninae) [color=#00ff00]Only 5.1.4 B[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/anNI5Kk.gif[/img]

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]SNAIAN/SLUAN COMPANIONS[/color][/size][/b]

You can talk to these Gastropods, and ask them to follow you in the cave , because you are afraid of the dark, alone !

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=961238SnaianCompanion.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/961238SnaianCompanion.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][size=4][color=#00ff00]REPOPULATE WITH MUSHROOMS[/color][/size][/b] (Additional Mod - Standalone Mod)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?] NEXUS[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=729997420] STEAM[/url]

Video by [color=#ff0000]Just Call Me Frosty/laiilaiiheii [/color](with my two mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim [/url]+ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms [/url])

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]XZgwCY8dqXU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-



[color=#ff0000][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

Merci aux moddeurs suivants, sans qui ce mod n'aurait pas été réalisé!

[color=#ff0000]SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4[/color] for the Snails and the Slugs in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?] Beasts of Tamriel [/url]

Meshes (Snail, Slug, Snaian, Sluan) are from [color=#ff0000]m150[/color] (a big thank) in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70950/?] SnailTouristFollower [/url] ("all of his resources are free as long as you give him credit and link to the original mod")

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the meshes and the textures of the horses (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Stroti -Tamira - Phitt [/color]for the Mushroom House with some stuff in the mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64655/?] Stroti's Mushroom House Resource [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64590/?] Stroti Resource Pack II [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62787/?] Stroti's Treehouse Resource [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60492/?] Phitt's Fishtank [/url]

[color=#ff0000]BadGremlin [/color]for the 2 fishes in a bowl of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63537/?] BadGremlins Something Fishy [/url]

For the Meshes of Mr and Mrs Mushroom and Mushroom Skeever, thanks to [color=#ff0000] Vicn[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url]

Et un grand Merci aux auteurs de ces tutoriels (in French and English) qui m’ont permis de construire cette « maison » et surtout de comprendre quelque chose à ces « Navmeshes », alors que je désespérais de voir « Mister » rester dans son coin comme un pauvre malheureux (et refuser de suivre mon perso)

[color=#ff0000] julespo3d [/color] for [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HiyMfsZX76I&feature=youtu.be]7-[ TUTO FR ] Les Navmesh [/url]
[color=#ff0000] WitchOfTheWinds [/color] for [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuDaz1PgZdI]Skyrim Creation Kit Tutorial - Creating A Player House #1/2/3/4[/url]
[color=#ff0000]Wiwiland[/color] for [url=http://wiwiki.wiwiland.net/index.php/Creation_Kit_:_Techniques_annexes_:_Portes,_Navmeshes,_et_palettes] Portes, Navmeshes, et palettes [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Kahjiit Raj[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16831/?] Golden Egg Treasure Hunt [/url] for the textures (with:Wyeko,struckdumb,super_chicken,bigsteve7743,Enchantedgal,WanderingSoul,kuschelirmel,Wisdoms_Pe,ttainted_sharben)
of some Eggs ("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

[color=#ff0000]Dogtown1[/color] for the meshe/texture of the Ant in his [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=432877090] SkyMoMod[/url]

[color=#ff0000]Blary[/color] for the moths, paintings, ingredients, in the mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30603/?] Moth in Cage Resource [/url] ;[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30602/?] Ingredients Wall Art Resource [/url] ;[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30601/?] Ingredients in a Jar Resource [/url]; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30599/] Alchemy Clutter Resource [/url] and[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/?] OpenBooks Resource [/url]

Original textures from Bethesda ! (Bethesda made the texture and then decided not to bother putting them in the game because there have been no meshes made for them; The texture location is textures/clutter/snail which contains snail.dds, snail_n.dds and translucentsnail.dds)
author: gg77

files.name: Snails Slugs Snaians and Sluans of Skyrim 6.1.3
files.fileName: Snails Slugs Snaians and Sluans of Skyrim 6.1.3-76818-6-1-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
All versions: correction of a bug with my mod Creatures House + minor changes

6.1: correction of a bug in the version 6.0.1 (only) with Farengar

All versions: correction of a bug with the fence

6.0: Adds 3 Horses Long/Ebony/Leather Armored + Chess, Cards, Dice, Nestbox, Skooma Pipe !

5.1.1/B/C: Adds a note in the Mailbox

Only Esp 5.1C: Replacement of the Discus by the Tigerfish

Only Esp 5.1B: Replacement of the Discus by the Clownfish

5.1: Adds 2 Aquariums with Freshwater angelfish + Neon tetra + Discus

4.7: Adds some objects

4.6.1: New settings for two creatures and the book

4.6: Adds a new creature + minor changes

4.5: Redevelopment of the main room

4.4: Adds new paintings and new incubated eggs...

4.2: Adds 2 new creatures + more decoration in the house

3.9: Adds ingredients in a jar + minor changes

3.8: Adds a new furniture with 5 Insects in jar

3.7: Adds two paintings and new incubated eggs...

3.6: Adds 3 Moths in cage

3.5: Adds 2 new creatures...

3.0: Adds a Mushroom House with a Snaian Companion and a mysterious cave

2.1: You can incarnate different Snaians

2.0: Adds the Snaians (Dwarfs Gastropods)

1.2: Changing the position on the Slug

1.1: Resolution of the textures increased
